name: Kolker Brush
description: Kolker Brush is a weighty hand lettered brush script. As with any script, it is never recommended to use all caps when editing copy. Use Kolker Brush for situations that require a bit of punch. It comes with Latin Character sets including Western, Central, and Vietnamese language support. To contribute, see github.com/googlefonts/kolker-brush .
author: Robert Leuschke
